column9:
Saw this French cafe on the way to Saluhallen (which I missed as they closed at 3 on Sat.).  So Saluhallen’s loss is Le Croissant’s gain.

Tried the Blueberry Tart (Blaborspaj) and it was very good.  Not too sweet and with a flaky crust.  The...More
